channel.title: thunar on budRich.github.io - Boiling rice in coffe
channel.description: Recent content in thunar on budRich.github.io - Boiling rice in coffe

item.title: uca
item.description: This file contains user defined actions that can be used within thunar. One can use the unique-id to bind actions to hotkeys in ~/.config/Thunar/accels.scm.

item.title: hidden
item.description: This file (~/.config/xfce4/xfconf/xfce-perchannel-xml/thunar.xml) contains hidden settings for thunar. By altering this file before launching an instance of thunar, one can manipulate the appearance (sort, icon-size e.t.c) of the thunar window. www.youtube.com/watch?v=9ZJLMid348M

item.title: accels
item.description: This file contains thunars keybindings (or accelerators, as keybindings is called in GTK). The file is autogenerated, so any formatting to the file is pointless. To modify an existing keybinding, one just remove the ; and change the last string of the line to the desired keycombination.
